text: Virgil is a city in Greenwood County, Kansas, United States. In 2020, 48 people lived there. ==History== The first post office in Virgil was created in 1863. The community may be named after Virgil, New York. ==Geography== Virgil is at (37.980603, -96.011090). According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of , all of it land. ===Climate=== Virgil has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters.
